person.persName: Louise Cabois Berthe Ballard (Widow of slave trader Rice Carter Ballard)

body.p: Natchez, Mississippi, native. Married to Rice Carter Ballard. Mother of Ellen Ballard, Ann Carter Ballard, and Chalotte Berthe Ballard. Resident of Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850 and 1860. Household owned seven enslaved persons in Louisville, in 1850 and four in Louisville, in 1860.
